data.title: Media are being selected from the scratch pool when there is available assigned media in the given volume pool.
data.text:
Solution

The PREFER_SPAN_TO_SCRATCH setting was added to NetBackup version 7.7.

Details of the setting can be found in NetBackup Administrator Guides:

https://www.veritas.com/support/en_US/doc/18716246-142506936-0/v95652504-142506936

To check and/or change that setting, use the following commands for each required media server.

nbemmcmd -listsettings -machinename <host>

NBEMMCMD, Version: x.x

The following configuration settings were found:

PREFER_SPAN_TO_SCRATCH="yes"

nbemmcmd -changesetting -machinename <host> -PREFER_SPAN_TO_SCRATCH NO
